84059.summary: Some customers in the Between Lakewood and Crestview area of Winnipeg are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
84059.title: Oct 24 - Winnipeg (Between Lakewood and Crestview) | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)
